bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part VIII. The United States of America IV.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. VIII, 355-356. - New Haven, Yale University (P. Dura).
bibl.seg: Bruckner Albert and Robert Marichal, Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part VIII. The United States of America IV.
Dietikon - Zürich, Urs Graf Verlag, 1976, in fol., ill.
Ch.L.A. VIII, 355-356. - New Haven, Yale University (P. Dura).
C.R. par A. Deman, Scriptorium 32 (1978) pp. 126-127. - A. Petrucci, Gnomon 51 (1979) pp. 26-31. - G. Poethke, ArchPF 26 (1978) p. 132 (concerne aussi les Parts VI et VII).
